meanings.sent1: She keynoted the conference with an inspiring speech.
meanings.sent2: The professor keynoted the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The cat keynoted the family meeting with a meow.
meanings.sent4: His words keynoted the importance of unity.
meanings.sent5: The melody of her voice keynoted the entire room.

meanings.definition: To serve as the keynote speaker at an event.
meanings.sent1: He keynoted the seminar on leadership skills.
meanings.sent2: The CEO keynoted the annual company retreat.
meanings.sent3: The dog keynoted the obedience class with a bark.
meanings.sent4: Her presence keynoted the success of the fundraiser.
meanings.sent5: The energy in his speech keynoted the audience's attention.
